product_name: REI Fleet T-Shirt - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: The men's REI Fleet T-shirt offers smooth texture and moisture-wicking performance to ensure you're ready for action whether you're going for a run or playing flag football in the park. Lightweight, breathable polyester wicks away moisture and dries quickly; fabric also features a hint of stretch for comfortable movement. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Special buy.
short_description: The men's REI Fleet T-shirt offers smooth texture and moisture-wicking performance to ensure you're ready for action whether you're going for a run or playing flag football in the park.
